messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: I am in a group. The group wants to stop killer robots.

Killer robots are not like in the movies. They are not scary robots from a film. But they are real now. Soldiers use machines like drones and special guns. These machines kill people. A person does not help very much.

Soon, there will be new robots. They will follow orders. But in the end, they will decide who to kill. They will decide on their own.

I think this is very wrong. It is also dangerous for all people. We need to be very careful. We must think about what we ask machines to do.
